lexUnit.name: declare.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: announce solemnly or officially; make clearly known.

sentence.text: An epidemic is only declared when the number of cases reaches more than 100 per 100,000 .
